mapper.select: SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(R.RESUME_NO) FROM TBL_APPLYING_HISTORY AH JOIN TBL_RESUME R ON (AH.RESUME_NO = R.RESUME_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON (R.IN_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE AH.JOB_POST_APPLYING_STATUS = '지원완료' AND AH.JOB_POST_NO = #{ jobPostNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectSkills() */ HS.RESUME_NO , S.SKILLS_NAME FROM TBL_RESUME_HOLDING_SKILLS HS JOIN TBL_SKILLS S ON (HS.SKILLS_NO = S.SKILLS_NO)

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectResume() */ R.RESUME_NO , R.RESUME_TITLE , JF.JOB_NAME , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_PHONE , M.MEM_EMAIL FROM TBL_RESUME R JOIN TBL_JOB_FIELD JF ON(R.JOB_NO = JF.JOB_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON(R.IN_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE R.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectAwardHistory() */ A.AWD_NAME , A.AWD_AGENCY , A.AWD_DATE , A.AWD_CONTENT FROM TBL_AWARD_HISTORY A WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectCareerHistory() */ A.CAR_COM_NAME , A.CAR_HIRE_DATE , A.CAR_ENT_DATE , A.CAR_STATUS , A.CAR_DEPT_NAME , A.CAR_JOB_NAME , A.CAR_WORK_FIELD , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_END_DATE , A.PROJECT_CONTENT , A.JOB_NO , A.RESUME_NO FROM TBL_CAREER_HISTORY A WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectEducationHistory() */ A.EDU_NAME , A.EDU_AGENCY , A.EDU_START_DATE , A.EDU_END_DATE , A.EDU_CONTENT FROM TBL_EDUCATION_HISTORY A WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectSelfIntroduction() */ A.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_CONTENT , B.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NAME FROM TBL_SELF_INTRODUCTION_CONTENT A JOIN TBL_SELF_INTRODUCTION_ITEM B ON (A.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NO = B.SELF_INTRO_ITEM_NO) WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectLicenseHistory() */ A.LICENSE_NAME , A.LICENSE_AGENCY , A.LICENSE_DATE FROM TBL_LICENSE_HISTORY A WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }
SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectPortFolio() */ A.POT_LINK_ADDRESS FROM TBL_PORTFOLIO A WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.recruit.applicant.model.mapper.RecruitApplicantMapper#selectSkillsAndName() */ A.RESUME_NO , B.SKILLS_NAME FROM TBL_RESUME_HOLDING_SKILLS A JOIN TBL_SKILLS B ON (A.SKILLS_NO = B.SKILLS_NO) WHERE A.RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }
